title: Re: madman on the loose
content:
Heh! Lets see...

[ Gasp!] Individualist, aanvallende forgein spreken!

Ah, you are suffering inverse standard holiday theory. Usually it is the younger generation that disrupts an expensive vacation. You can think of this as revenge for that time you cried all the way through your parents weekend away. [You were 1.5 at the time I belive.]A proud member of the signature stealing society
